data.actual_result: Discord doesn't respond to most if not all taps and when it does respond it's with a ridiculous delay.
data.expected_result: Discord responds to every tap without a very noticeable delay.
data.short_description: Discord becomes mostly unresponsive when viewing member list in certain channels on large servers.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Discord Testers server - Go to the <#197038744908333066> chat - Tap on Member List - Try to tap anything.
